content: @Chris Carr I'm looking at the Apps for Imaging research track, and that's lead me to https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRnHr2wL0hQvqZum0fneD45GyqIjaHs144iApike-AxVUPwhQP3matTV-SjdAZlTZ3xGd_ySKh3u4Bk/pub where I'm wondering why this:
If authorization has been granted, the EHR application passes the request through to the PACS or DICOM RS Broker (see EHR-07)
why require a proxy service like this?
